(#{item.methodName}, #{item.methodDesc}, #{item.access}, #{item.className}, #{item.value}, #{item.jarName}, #{item.jarId})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.method_id, jt.jar_name, m.method_name, m.class_name, m.method_desc, m.is_static, m.access, m.jar_id FROM method_table m INNER JOIN method_string_table ms ON ms.mid = m.method_id INNER JOIN string_value_table sv ON sv.sid = ms.sid LEFT JOIN jar_table jt ON m.jar_id = jt.jid WHERE sv.value = #{value}
SELECT value FROM string_value_table ORDER BY value COLLATE NOCASE LIMIT 100 OFFSET #{offset}
